adhika shithale sewaka ayithiwasikam rahitha sewakayeku lesa kada sappu wala eliwena kal wada kala hati, rakka pirawu hati, bara kara gasu hati, ehemath kara ee payinma wishwa widyalayata gos panthi kamara wala nida watunu hati, kamara kuliya pramada wu dineka ee kamara ayithikaruwange gembar balu hati, bas gasthu ithiri karaganimin sathapum ganan payin giya hati, wel ganan kusaginne hitiya hati, mawi peneyi…eeka eka kalpayaka siduwu de lesa bahara kara nositimi…eya ma wairaya adhika manushyayeku lesa hada gaswu kalayaki….ee dweshaya, ee wairaya, ee ichcha bhangathwaya yali yali sihiyata nagami…..samata dadayama wu aahara piramidaye pahalama stharaye sitina sathun windina wedanawa windemi….ee wedanawa hondin danimi….
